title: Strange Things in DaYan
overview: One bizarre murder after another unfolded, leading to a catastrophic bloodbath that wiped out an entire clan. As the reserve constable Ding Buwen grappled with the unexpected loss of his family and the departure of a close friend, he uncovered the harsh truths hidden behind layers of deceitful events. Along this journey, he developed a deep bond and romance with the enigmatic traveling physician Mo Sangyu, while also forming alliances. Through a complex web of hatred and warmth, he experienced an inspiring story of growth and resilience.
